name: Akshdeep Singh
biography: Akshdeep Singh is an Indian sport shooter who has represented India in several international competitions. He has won multiple medals at national and international levels, including a gold medal at the ISSF World Cup in 2023.
childhood: Akshdeep Singh was born in Punjab, India. He took up shooting at a young age and initially faced challenges, including a serious injury to an onlooker, which led to depression and a lack of a coach until he joined Joydeep Karmakar's academy in Kolkata.
professional_career: Singh's professional career has seen significant growth. He has won multiple medals at national and international competitions, including a gold medal at the ISSF World Cup in 2023. He has also secured an Olympic quota place for India at the 2024 Paris Olympics.
